DESCRIPTION: If you are in a #yStance, trigger its Technique bonus.
Extra effect when played in the listed #yStance.
After playing a Finisher, if you are in a #yStance, exit it, trigger its Finisher bonus, and end your turn.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
You have #b1 #yStrength for every #b5 Resolve. At the end of combat, heal HP equal to your Resolve.

#yStance. Counts as all #b3 #yStances. NL Finishers do not end your turn or exit the Stance. NL You can't change to any other #yStance.
